title: The Cub scout in the pack
creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
brief_description: The film illustrates a typical Cub Pack theme, in this case a circus, from beginning to end. Emphasis is placed in the part played by the Cub-master, Den Mothers, Den Dads, Den Chief, parents and Cub Scouts.
